item.title: Your Artistry + Our Brand: E-Commerce Video Editor Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Video Sales Letter Creation / VSL Production / Long-Form Direct-Response Video Editing

Do you know what makes a high converting VSL? Do you love creating the best video you've ever made? Do you have experience creating long-form Video Sales Letter (at least 2+ min) and really enjoy doing it? And do you want a long-term contract with good base pay + bonus commission?

We are a performance marketing team that runs multiple offers on high scale utilizing VSLs only. We crank out between 20-30 VSLs per month. Basically you'll work with Top Media Buyers and Copywriters to create the next winning Video campaign.

What’s important is the following:
-You are excellent in swiping winning VSLs to create the next best VSL
-You can use persuasive, suitable Video Material suiting the script to convey the message
-You are researching Video Material on your own
-You use the 80/20 to focus on the main parts of the video
-You can follow deadlines
-You work well in a fast-paced and rapidly growing environment

If you possess the qualities above, we’d like to talk to you. This is an awesome position in an awesome industry (Performance Marketing and eCommerce). It will open up a ton of new projects for you, you'll be taking deep into existing winning campaigns, where you can learn & hone your skills right at the source.

Oh and the commission bonuses - we weren't kidding about that! Every time you create a winning VSL for us, there is a bonus waiting for you.

TO APPLY:
-Submit your application by filling out this form: forms.gle/PBm7dNXUoowPur9aA

OTHER DETAILS:
- You’ll start as an independent contractor with the opportunity to become a full time contractor for us after your initial performance.
- Compensation is depending on your skills, experience and how awesome you are.
- Attention to detail is important. If you will not fill out the Google form that we have provided above, your application is automatically rejected.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 10:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Sales Letter, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Sales Letter, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Wedding video editing! - Upwork
item.description:
Greetings! I am an amateur videographer. I have one wedding I shot with a rode microphone on my Canon M5 EOS. It includes both stills and video content all shot horizontally, a wedding rehearsal, a rehearsal dinner, the wedding ceremony, the dinner after the wedding, and dance segment after the dinner. I would like to create a wonderful contemporary wedding video that includes all of these events, with smooth and thoughtful transitions, intro, and exit slides. Additionally, the wedding ceremony has horrific reverb, they didn't test the microphones before the event. So I would like the audio optimized and balanced as much as possible throughout the video. Secondly, I would like to have a 3-minute trailer of the highlights of all the events. I'm not looking for huge flashy special effects. Just good solid editing with straight cuts panning, zooming, and transitions where the moment is most important, not the editing. Being proficient with sound engineering is very important. Thank you! I appreciate your expertise.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

Additionally, the wedding ceremony has horrific reverb, they didn't test the microphones before the event. So I would like the audio optimized and balanced as much as possible throughout the video. Just good solid editing with straight cuts panning, zooming, and transitions where the moment is most important, not the editing. Being proficient with sound engineering is very important. Thank you! item.title: Creative Director for an Ad Agency (Hourly Contract) - Upwork
item.description:
🚀 Join Our Team as a Part-Time Creative Director and Revolutionise Advertising at Click Hive Ltd!

Company: Click Hive Ltd
Location: Remote
Reports To: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)

About Us:

Click Hive Ltd is on a mission to redefine advertising! We craft compelling ad content that drives engagement and results. Specialising in user-generated content (UGC) and graphic ads, we're all about delivering top-notch creative solutions that wow our clients and their audiences.

Why This Role Rocks:

Are you a creative genius with a knack for graphic design and video editing? Do you thrive on leading talented teams to create jaw-dropping ads? If so, we want YOU to join our team as a part-time Creative Director! This is your chance to shape the future of advertising with a company that values innovation and creativity.

Key Responsibilities:

Creative Leadership:
Inspire and direct our creative team to new heights.
Review and refine creative work to perfection.
Pitch groundbreaking ideas that captivate our clients.
Roll up your sleeves and dive into projects when needed.

Team Management:
Lead a team of graphic designers, video editors, and copywriters.
Provide feedback and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
Spark creativity through dynamic brainstorming sessions.

Project Oversight:
Manage creative tasks in Trello with precision.
Ensure timely delivery and top-notch quality of all creative assets.
Collaborate with the UGC Manager and Graphic Designer to hit client targets.

Client Interaction:
Present your visionary concepts in monthly client meetings.
Keep the communication flowing to understand client needs.
Deliver creative solutions that align with client goals and brand ethos.

Reporting and Analysis:
Track and report on creative team performance.
Analyse feedback and campaign results to fine-tune strategies.

Skills and Qualifications:

Must-Have:

1. Proven experience in social media advertising.
2. Mastery in graphic design and video editing.
3. Exceptional leadership and team management skills.
4. Stellar communication and presentation abilities.
5. Expertise in Canva and Adobe Creative Suite.
6. Proficiency with Trello or similar project management tools.
7. Strong organisational skills and a keen eye for detail.

Bonus Points:

eCommerce experience is a massive plus!

What We Offer:

- Flexible (depending on current workload), part-time hourly contract role with competitive pay.
- Opportunities for performance-based bonuses.
- A dynamic and remote work environment.
- The chance to lead a creative revolution in advertising!

How to Apply:

Ready to make your mark in the world of advertising? Send your application, portfolio, and tell us why you're the perfect fit for this role.

Hourly Range: $24.00-$54.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:57 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Communications, Marketing Strategy, Creative Strategy, Project Management
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Communications, Marketing Strategy, Creative Strategy, Project Management
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: UGC Creator for a trading platform - Upwork
item.description:
HI!
I am looking for a UCG (user-generated content) creator, who can create a short promo video in English describing an online trading platform. The company is a licensed trading broker.

The video must be portrait-oriented.

Please make sure you have good-quality headphones and a phone that can take good-quality video.

I will provide you with a script, you will need to send me the footage shot on your smartphone. The editing and post-production will be done by the team on our side.

The video will be later used as an advertisement on social media.
If you have done such videos before, please share an example

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:29 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Spokesperson Video, English, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Skills: UGC, Spokesperson Video, English, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing
Country: Portugal

item.title: HIGH Converting VSL INTRO | Video Ads Expert-Video Sales Letter - VIDEO 2min30 - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor who has already created captivating Video Sales Letters (VSL) to edit our VSL Introduction. The VSL should be engaging to watch and hold the attention of our viewers.

This is not a one-time project; we are looking for a long-term partnership as we have many videos to edit and create. Therefore, we need someone who is reliable and can meet deadlines.

Requirements:

- Experience in editing long VSLs 2 to 60min
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro
- Ability to meet deadlines and work collaboratively
- Ability to add footage related to the script
- Ability to identify which musicbackground is good to add and should match the context
- Animation and sounds effect skills
- Ability to create a VSL in a non english language (german, french, ...)
- Add subtitles to the VSL (if you are using autorecognation AI or any other tools you must double check the subtitles as the accuracy is not 100%, especially for names and cities)
- Strong attention to detail (no need to mention the basic requirements, we are expecting quality work not just a job done quickly)
- HIGH Converting VSL Editor | Video Ads Expert-Video Sales Letter


If you think you are the perfect candidate for this job, please send us your portfolio and let us know why you are the best fit for this long-term partnership.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 17, 2024 09:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Photographer/Videographer for Employer Branding Shoot - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled photographer/videographer to capture employer branding images and create a video for our company website. The shoot will involve capturing portrait and mood images that communicate our brand's values and culture. The selected professional will be responsible for capturing high-quality photographs and videos that showcase our company's unique identity. This project requires creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to work collaboratively with our team.

Relevant skills:
- Photography
- Videography
- Creative composition
- Lighting techniques
- Video editing

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate
Date: one day from 01.07.2024 to 04.07.2024 (from 17.00)

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
